Labor.description: Labor in a hazardous environment, risking injury but earning rewards.

rewards.bond: I earned the trust of an influential supervisor named _____, and they gave me a chance at something greater.

Labor.description: Spend time gaining skill in your craft, becoming a reliable worker in your field.

rewards.bond: I honed my skills under a seasoned mentor named _____, who taught me everything I know.

Labor.description: Take a job at a dangerous factory working with a volatile substance.

rewards.bond: The accident at the factory in _____ changed me forever.

Labor.description: Work long hours to try and move up the ladder.

rewards.bond: I spent years breaking my back for _____, yet they never paid me what I deserved.

Labor.description: You search for a new job after you are laid off.

rewards.bond: I lost my job at _____ due to sudden cutbacks, and now I must start over.

Labor.description: Get assigned to a deadly line of work by management - for great pay.

rewards.bond: I almost died doing _____, and I will make sure never to go back.

Labor.description: Invent a new idea to improve workflow.

rewards.bond: I devised a method that revolutionized work at the plant on _____.

Labor.description: Attempt to negotiate better working conditions.

rewards.bond: I negotiated fair treatment at work with my boss _____, and earned their respect.

Labor.description: Strike with your fellow workers to demand more pay.

rewards.bond: During the strike, I stood up for my fellow workers. My old boss _____ still owes me my pay.

Labor.description: Repair a malfunctioning machine before it becomes a danger.

rewards.bond: I fixed a critical breakdown at _____ when no one else could.

Labor.description: Get promoted for your hard work, securing a nice bonus.

rewards.bond: I was promoted during my work at _____, for my dedication and skill.

Labor.description: Work through a power outage during a freak storm.

rewards.bond: I endured the chaos from the _____ and kept the operation running.

Labor.description: Fix minor safety violations.

rewards.bond: I took charge during the safety review and earned my boss _____'s trust.

Labor.description: Fix a flaw in the production process

rewards.bond: I uncovered a flaw at _____ that saved us a fortune.

Labor.description: Volunteer for overtime work as much as possible.

rewards.bond: I worked overtime for my boss _____ when it mattered most.

Labor.description: Gain a mentor from the workers union you join.

rewards.bond: My mentor _____ from the union believes in my future.

Labor.description: Witness your jobs competition falter.

rewards.bond: The misfortune at a rival plant on _____ paved the way for our success.

Labor.description: Install a new piece of machinery and train others in its operation.

rewards.bond: I became the go-to expert on new technology at our facility.

Labor.description: Have a minor accident on the job, furtunately surviving and getting worker's compensation.

rewards.bond: I bear a scar from a near-miss incident at _____ that reminds me to always be cautious.

Labor.description: You witness a machine explode violently.

rewards.bond: The explosion I witnessed almost killed me, but thanks to my friend _____, I survived.
I pulled off the job of a lifetime, robbing _____.

Crime.description: Plan out a flawless scam to pull on a high-value target.

rewards.bond: I orchestrated a perfect scam against _____, robbing them of a precious item.

Crime.description: Form an alliance with a powerful crime lord.

rewards.bond: I worked with ______, a powerful crime lord who no longer likes me.

Crime.description: Join a rival syndicate to your current employer.

rewards.item: Crowbar 1d6 (Aid|Might), Light Revolver 1d6 (Quick, Ergonomic, Near-Ranged, Ammo)
rewards.bond: I received an offer I couldn’t refuse from a rival syndicate called _____, forever altering my path.

Crime.description: Witness a close associate of yours get arrested.

rewards.bond: I let my friend _____ take the fall for me—and they'll never forget my betrayal.

Crime.description: Escape a failed undercover operation before you're killed.

rewards.bond: I escaped an undercover bust by the skin of my teeth—_____ is still hunting me.

Crime.description: Attempt a breakout from the prison you're stuck in.

rewards.bond: I made a legendary escape from the prison on _____ that still haunts the guards to this day.

Crime.description: Extort a corrupt official, securing a hefty sum and valuable connections.

rewards.bond: I extorted _____, they still fear me revealing what I know about them.

Crime.description: Plan a meticulous burgulary of a powerful item.

rewards.bond: I broke into a vault at _____ and made off with treasures that many only dream of.

Crime.description: After a miscalculated heist, flee from the law as it pursues you.

rewards.item: Officer's Shotgun 1d10 (Quick, Unruly, Near-range, Ammo, Forceful, Loading)
rewards.bond: I made a mistake that put myself and my friend _____ in jeopardy, a lesson learned the hard way.

Crime.description: Attempt to escape the betrayal of your trusted partner, barely making it out.

rewards.bond: I was betrayed by _____, and now I carry that scar in more ways than one.

Crime.description: Fight for survival when you are ambushed by a rival syndicate.

rewards.bond: I survived an ambush from _____, it left me forever wary of those who envy my success.

Crime.description: Partake in a risky smuggling operation that transports illegal goods.

rewards.item: Stolen Lockbox, Smuggler's Knife 1d4 (Quick, Unruly, Melee)
rewards.bond: I barely escaped a smuggling bust—I still wonder if _____ ever escaped.

Crime.description: Spend a night gambling at the casino and partaking in revelry and hedonism.

rewards.bond: My gambling finally got me into trouble, I owe 10,000 credits to _____ and they always collect.

Crime.description: A burglary goes wrong and you attempt to make it out alive - fortunately escaping with a large sum of credits.
Crime.bond: A botched burglary left me scarred—and taught me to never work alone, now I work with _____.

Crime.description: Escape from a solo heist empty-handed but alive.

rewards.bond: My solo job ended in failure, I vow to not fall victim to my pride ever again.

Crime.description: Attempt to intimidate my rival with an aggressive attack.

rewards.bond: I tried to intimidate my rival _____ and it backfired in the worst possible way.

Crime.description: Double cross your boss during a high-stakes operation, if it works you'll be rich enough to retire, if not, well, it was a good run.

rewards.item: 3 Ammo, Slugthrower 1d8 (Unruly, Ergonomic, Near-range, Ammo, Loading, Piercing 8)
rewards.bond: I made a critical mistake by crossing _____, and now my future is forever uncertain.

Exploration.description: Investigate the exotic plants you found on a megaflora world.

rewards.bond: The plants on _____ left me stunned and fascinated.

Exploration.description: Venture into a mountainside cave you find one day while traveling.

rewards.bond: I braved the heights of Mt. _____ on the planet _____ to uncover a cave rich in gemstones.

Exploration.description: Attempt to enter the seemingly abandoned outpost that lies ahead of you.

rewards.bond: I salvaged classified technology from an old forgotten outpost that used to belong to _____.

Exploration.description: You spy some rare medicinal herbs on the side of a trail, you attempt to gather them

rewards.bond: I braved the swamp to harvest nature's hidden remedies on _____.

Exploration.description: Relax and enjoy the beauty of a pristine hidden waterfall.

rewards.bond: Me and my friend _____ spent a while relaxing at the waterfall.

Exploration.description: Take a mission to an abandoned mining colony to figure out what happened there.

rewards.bond: I can't believe what happened at the mining colony on _____.

Exploration.description: Press on through the dense coastal fog as it surrounds you.

rewards.bond: I discovered what happened to the crew that crashed in the fog on _____.

Exploration.description: Attempt to rescue a stranded person stuck on a perilous river crossing.

rewards.bond: I saved _____ from a fall into a deadly river.

Exploration.description: Try the mysterious golden fruit hanging down from a tree that has crossed your path.

rewards.bond: I encountered a botanical enigma on _____.

Exploration.description: Attempt to traverse an underground cavern system to find a lost caver.

rewards.bond: I delved deep and rescued _____ from the caves that trapped them.

Exploration.description: Traverse an ancient canyon looking for carvings of an underdeveloped tribe.

rewards.bond: I discovered carvings left by a tribe on _____.

Exploration.description: Gaze up at a majestic arch over a canyon.

rewards.bond: I witnessed a beautiful natural formation in the canyons on _____.

Exploration.description: Seek shelter with your caravan from a sudden desert sandstorm.

rewards.bond: I found refuge in a ruin with my friend _____.

Exploration.description: Attempt to mine some weird glowing rocks you find in a glacial tundra.

rewards.bond: I discovered rocks on the planet _____ that make perfect capacitors.

Exploration.description: Step into an extremely deadly, trapped, temple in pursuit of riches beyond my wildest dreams.

rewards.bond: I found incredible riches in the dangerous ziggurat on _____, my partner _____ fell to their doom along the way.

Exploration.description: On a solo expedition through treacherous highlands, you narrowly escape a sudden landslide.

rewards.bond: I survived a landslide in the highlands on _____.

Space.description: Fix up your starship after it sustains heavy damage in a meteor shower.

rewards.bond: I survived a meteor shower by trusting my pilot _____.

Space.description: Navigate through an asteroid belt to a mysterious distress beacon.

rewards.bond: I salvaged valuable satellite parts with my copilot _____ in the midst of a deadly asteroid field.

Space.description: A sudden engine malfunction in deep space forces you to perform an emergency repair.

rewards.bond: I overcame an engine malfunction caused by _____'s careless negligence.

Space.description: Attempt to hold your ship together when it hits a spatial distortion and is sent wildly off course.

rewards.bond: I survived an axial navigation error and saved my friend ______.

Space.description: Explore a derelict starship you found floating in deep space.

rewards.bond: I uncovered a powerful weapon in a destroyed starship lost in the _____ system.

Space.description: Take a routine patrol through a beautiful gas nebula.

rewards.bond: I charted the beauty and dangers of a nebula, earning respect from _____.

Space.description: Negotiate for crucial repairs to your ship at a station in the middle of nowhere.

rewards.bond: I earned favor with the mechanic _____ in the _____ system.

Space.description: Survive getting hit by a rogue asteroid.

rewards.bond: I braved a deepspace collision, I survived thanks to my and my friend _____'s quick thinking.
I transported supplies for ______.

Space.description: Fight a group of pirates that board your ship, hopefully making them reconsider robbing you.

rewards.item: Breacher Shotgun 1d8 (Unruly, Aid|Might, Near-range, Ammo, Loading, Violent 1)
rewards.bond: I crossed paths with pirates led by the dread captain _____.

Space.description: Uncover a stash of dangerous anti-ship weapons, drawing the ire of the smugglers who owned them.

rewards.item: Surface to Air Ion Cannon 1d12 (charging 1, Loading, Ammo, Far-range, Violent 3, Volatile)
rewards.bond: I stole a dangerous weapon from a ship belonging to the criminal _____.

extraItem.item: Levered Light Rifle (Ergonomic, Scoped, Ammo, Consistent)

Space.description: Practice scanning for incoming and fleeing ships by tracking their Axials.

rewards.bond: I tracked _____ and their ship through a skip.

Space.description: Help chart a new trade route to a desperate system, hopefully finding great profit.

rewards.bond: I helped _____ and their people get the resources they need.

Space.description: Pause a moment to admire a beautiful supernova from a safe distance, probably.

rewards.bond: I witnessed a supernova while traveling with my friend _____, I'll cherish that memory.

Space.description: Explore an abandoned station filled with unused fuel.

rewards.bond: I discovered an abandoned station in the _____ system, I could always make it a base of operations.

Space.description: Help pull off a deadly high-risk maneuver during a combat scenario.

rewards.bond: I averted a catastrophic death in deep space, I will make sure I get my revenge against _____.

Espionage.description: Disguise yourself to infiltrate a secret gala filled with dangerous figures.

Espionage.description: Secure a confidential meeting with a high-ranking official under false pretenses.

rewards.bond: I secured a meeting with _____, allowing me to steal their information.

Espionage.description: Infiltrate a hostile stronghold, dodging security measures to retrieve secret files.

Education.description: Deliver a textbook .

rewards.bond: I captivated an audience of experts and earned their lasting admiration.

Education.description: Deciphering an ancient text, you uncover lost knowledge of a bygone era.

rewards.bond: I uncovered secrets that challenge our understanding of history.

Education.description: A heated debate in a prestigious seminar forces you to defend your theories.

rewards.bond: I defended my ideas with unwavering conviction in the face of criticism.

Education.description: While researching in a dusty archive, you unearth a document of great importance.

rewards.bond: I discovered a document that could reshape academic thought.

Education.description: Your innovative experiment in material science leads to a breakthrough.

rewards.bond: I revolutionized my field with a breakthrough that defied expectations.

Education.description: A miscalculation in the lab causes a minor explosion, injuring you.

rewards.bond: I learned a harsh lesson from a failed experiment.

Education.description: Your research paper is published in a leading journal, earning you accolades.

rewards.bond: My work was heralded as a turning point in my field.

Education.description: A rival challenges your findings, igniting an intense academic confrontation.

rewards.bond: I stood up to fierce criticism and defended my research with passion.

Education.description: You mentor a promising student who later credits you for their success.

rewards.bond: I nurtured a brilliant mind that now shines in academia.

Education.description: At an international conference, your debate skills earn you widespread respect.

rewards.bond: I defended my ideas on a global stage and emerged victorious.

Education.description: A grant committee awards you funding for your innovative research proposal.

rewards.bond: I secured vital funding that will propel my research forward.

Education.description: A field study in remote terrain yields unexpected findings that challenge conventional wisdom.

rewards.bond: I ventured into the unknown and returned with data that defied expectations.

Education.description: You lead a groundbreaking workshop that inspires a generation of learners.

rewards.bond: I sparked a passion for knowledge that will endure for years to come.

Education.description: A lab accident forces you to reassess your safety protocols, costing valuable time.

rewards.bond: I emerged wiser from a chaotic lab incident that taught me caution.

rewards.bond: I uncovered records that promise to reshape academic paradigms.

rewards.bond: I forged alliances that enriched our collective understanding.

Education.description: Your experimental invention malfunctions catastrophically, forcing a hasty lab retreat.

Education.description: A visiting scholar from a distant world shares revolutionary ideas with you.

rewards.bond: I exchanged ideas with a visionary, broadening my academic horizons.

Education.description: A scathing peer review challenges your published work, sparking a fierce debate.

rewards.bond: I embraced criticism that will ultimately strengthen my future research.

Education.description: While exploring a forgotten library, you discover a trove of rare texts that inspire a new direction.

rewards.bond: I uncovered hidden knowledge that promises to redefine my field.

Prosperity.description: You orchestrate a financial coup that catapults you into high society.

rewards.bond: My daring financial maneuver turned the tables, making me a respected magnate.

Prosperity.description: You forge a lucrative alliance with a powerful corporation, securing future benefits.

rewards.bond: I built a partnership that promised wealth beyond my wildest dreams.

Prosperity.description: Your savvy investments yield unexpected profits, boosting your fortune significantly.

rewards.bond: My investments paid off, proving that fortune truly favors the bold.

Prosperity.description: A sudden market crash tests your resolve, but you emerge with valuable assets.

rewards.bond: I weathered a market crash, turning risk into opportunity.

Prosperity.description: Your charismatic negotiation skills secure a major government contract.

rewards.bond: I sealed a deal that cemented my reputation among the elite.

Prosperity.description: An innovative business idea strikes gold, attracting investors and media attention.

rewards.bond: My groundbreaking idea captured the imagination of investors.

Prosperity.description: You secure a lucrative merger with a rival company, doubling your assets overnight.

rewards.bond: I orchestrated a merger that redefined the corporate landscape.

Prosperity.description: A savvy acquisition gives you control of a key market niche.

rewards.bond: I acquired a company that unlocked a dominant market position.

Prosperity.description: Your reputation as a financial wizard attracts a secret benefactor with mysterious resources.

rewards.bond: A mysterious benefactor recognized my potential and lent their support.

Prosperity.description: A high-profile scandal rocks the financial district, and you skillfully navigate the fallout.

rewards.bond: I weathered a scandal and emerged with my reputation intact.

Prosperity.description: Your astute business strategy leads to a windfall from a failing competitor.

rewards.bond: I capitalized on a competitor’s misfortune to expand my empire.

Prosperity.description: An unexpected tax incentive and government rebate boost your cash flow.

rewards.bond: A stroke of bureaucratic luck enriched my business endeavors.

Prosperity.description: Your innovative marketing campaign captures public attention and increases sales dramatically.

rewards.bond: I launched a campaign that turned public opinion in my favor.

Prosperity.description: A sudden surge in market demand for your product results in record-breaking profits.

rewards.bond: I sealed a deal that promised global expansion and vast wealth.

Prosperity.description: A risky venture pays off as you discover a new, untapped resource in the market.

rewards.bond: I ventured into the unknown and discovered a new source of prosperity.

Prosperity.description: A major trade fair opens new opportunities, and your booth becomes the center of attention.

rewards.bond: I turned heads at the trade fair, drawing lucrative opportunities my way.

Prosperity.description: Your strategic risk in a volatile market pays off handsomely, increasing your assets overnight.

rewards.bond: I took a calculated risk and the market rewarded my boldness.

Prosperity.description: An insider tip leads you to a secret auction where rare assets are sold.

rewards.bond: I won a secret auction, acquiring assets that few could imagine.

Prosperity.description: In a high-stakes negotiation, you turn a financial crisis into a stepping stone for success.

rewards.bond: I transformed a crisis into an opportunity, cementing my status among the elite.

rewards.bond: I inspired a movement with words that resonated with the people.

Politics.description: A heated debate on live television forces you to defend your policies under intense scrutiny.

rewards.bond: I held my ground on national TV and earned respect among my peers.

Politics.description: You broker a crucial alliance with a powerful political faction, gaining influence in key circles.

rewards.bond: I forged an alliance that reshaped the power structure in our region.

Politics.description: A scandal erupts, and you skillfully spin the narrative to protect your reputation.

rewards.bond: I turned a scandal into an opportunity and emerged even stronger.

Politics.description: During a secret meeting, you uncover compromising information on a rival faction.

rewards.bond: I obtained explosive secrets that could shift the political balance.

Politics.description: A surprise endorsement from a celebrity-politician boosts your public image overnight.

rewards.bond: A famous figure backed me, and my influence skyrocketed.

rewards.bond: I pulled off a covert maneuver that left my opponent reeling.

Politics.description: You secure a key position on an influential committee, expanding your political clout.

rewards.bond: My appointment to a crucial committee changed the course of policy-making.

Politics.description: A public outcry forces your party to reconsider its stance, and you emerge as the voice of change.

rewards.bond: I turned public dissent into a rallying cry for reform.

Politics.description: During a clandestine meeting, you negotiate a peace treaty between warring factions.

rewards.bond: I brokered peace in a turbulent time, becoming a respected mediator.

Politics.description: Your investigative efforts reveal a hidden conspiracy that shakes the foundations of power.

rewards.bond: I uncovered a plot that threatens to upend the political order.

Politics.description: A bitter internal conflict forces you to choose sides, defining your political future.

rewards.bond: I made a defining choice that sealed my loyalty and set my path.

Politics.description: You orchestrate a daring political stunt that wins over undecided voters.

rewards.bond: My bold political stunt changed the tide of public opinion.

rewards.bond: I struck a deal with powerful lobbyists that promises vast rewards.

Politics.description: A contentious town hall meeting forces you to confront public dissent head-on.

rewards.bond: I faced down a hostile crowd and emerged with my principles intact.

rewards.bond: I turned an international crisis into an opportunity for dialogue.

Politics.description: A late-night strategy session with key advisors results in a bold, controversial proposal.

rewards.bond: I crafted a daring proposal that could redefine our future.

Politics.description: In the midst of a political crisis, you make a sacrificial decision that cements your legacy.

rewards.bond: I made a hard choice that will be remembered as a turning point in our history.

Warfare.description: You lead a desperate charge against overwhelming enemy forces.

rewards.bond: I led from the front, defying the odds in the face of death.

Warfare.description: A grueling siege stretches on for weeks, testing your endurance and willpower.

rewards.bond: I endured the agony of siege warfare and lived to tell the tale.

Warfare.description: You successfully sabotage an enemy installation behind enemy lines.

rewards.bond: I struck at the heart of the enemy’s war machine.

Warfare.description: Your squad is ambushed in a dense jungle. You fight tooth and nail to escape.

rewards.bond: I clawed my way out of an ambush that should have been my end.

Warfare.description: An intense firefight leaves you wounded, but you hold the line against all odds.

rewards.bond: I bled for my comrades, refusing to yield under fire.

Warfare.description: A brilliant tactical maneuver turns the tide of battle in your favor.

rewards.bond: My strategic mind altered the course of a hard-fought battle.

Warfare.description: You are taken prisoner by enemy forces, forced to endure brutal conditions.

rewards.bond: I suffered in captivity, but my spirit remained unbroken.

Warfare.description: A last-minute airstrike obliterates an enemy stronghold, ensuring victory.

rewards.bond: I called in a strike that changed the battlefield forever.

Warfare.description: You train a group of raw recruits, shaping them into a formidable unit.

rewards.bond: I turned green soldiers into warriors ready for war.

Warfare.description: A failed operation leaves you stranded behind enemy lines, forcing you to survive alone.

rewards.bond: I was left for dead behind enemy lines, yet I endured.

Warfare.description: You form an unbreakable bond with a fellow soldier after saving their life in combat.

rewards.bond: I saved a comrade, and our loyalty to each other will never waver.

Warfare.description: An unexpected betrayal within your ranks forces you to act swiftly.

rewards.bond: I exposed a traitor before they could do irreparable damage.

Warfare.description: A brutal hand-to-hand fight leaves you scarred but victorious.

rewards.bond: I survived the struggle of steel and fists, emerging victorious.

Warfare.description: You coordinate an underground resistance movement in occupied territory.

rewards.bond: I led the resistance when all hope seemed lost.

Warfare.description: You withstand a relentless artillery bombardment, holding your position.

rewards.bond: I braved a hellstorm of fire and steel, refusing to retreat.

Warfare.description: A daring nighttime raid leaves your squad victorious.

rewards.bond: I thrived in the shadows, striking where the enemy least expected.

Warfare.description: A devastating injury forces you to leave the battlefield and adapt to a new life.

rewards.bond: The war took its toll, but I refused to let it break me.

Warfare.description: Your leadership in a desperate situation earns you a battlefield promotion.

rewards.bond: I proved my worth in the fires of war and was recognized for it.
